description.raw:
What is this pull request implementing:

* New USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB cmake argument to control the use of AtlasSimInterface library.
* Check for support in 32bits Linux archs, if 32bits support is found, fail the cmake and ask to use the new  USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB=False to be sure users will know what's going on.
* In BSD archs, let's assume 64bits but warn users about this non implemented check.

All the API is kept, just make the functions using the binary lib to be empty.
description.html:
What is this pull request implementing:

  • New USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB cmake argument to control the use of AtlasSimInterface library.
  • Check for support in 32bits Linux archs, if 32bits support is found, fail the cmake and ask to use the new USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB=False to be sure users will know what's going on.
  • In BSD archs, let's assume 64bits but warn users about this non implemented check.

All the API is kept, just make the functions using the binary lib to be empty.

title.raw: Support for free AtlasSimInterface buillds (on by default for 32bits)
title.html: Support for free AtlasSimInterface buillds (on by default for 32bits)
